entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 10:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: S 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
